page.title: 12BLACKLAW FOOTBALL E.KILBRIDE
page.content: { {BLACKLAW FOOTBALL EAST KILBRIDE { }The Blacklaw Primary School Football pool consists of 14 players. We have won three cups this season. One was the North League cup. The other two were the soccer sevens cup at Claremont High and the Thistle Cup. We still have another final to play - North League versus South League. Our team is ........ Goalkeeper {PAUL TOMLINSON}, Right back {FRASER MCDONALD}, Left back { {BLAIR MATTHEW}, Centre half {DAVID {WANDS}, Sweeper {GRAEME GOODWILLIE}, Right half {DEREK CRAWFORD}, Centre midfield {KENNETH BALMAIN}(captain) , Left half {DAVID TAYLOR}, Right wing {RONALD NAIRN}, Left wing {STUART DUNN} Centre forward {MICHAEL WARLOW}. Substitutes {ROBERT KIRKHAM, STEVEN {MOIR, STEVEN KELLY.}
